typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		ProductID as string,
		Name as string,
		ProductNumber as string,
		Color as string,
		StandardCost as string,
		ListPrice as string,
		Weight as string,
		ProductCategoryID as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: true,
	inferDriftedColumnTypes: true) ~> source1
source1 aggregate(groupBy(ProductID),
	each(match(name!='ProductID'), $$ = first($$))) ~> Aggregate1
source1 filter(iif(or(or(iif(isNull(ProductID),true(),false()),iif(isNull(Weight),true(),false()))
,or(iif(isNull(Name),true(),false()),iif(isNull(Color),true(),false()))
),true(),false())) ~> Filter1
